<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Purify Food and Drink](/Spells.aspx?ID=241)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 362 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 cubic foot of contaminated food or water
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You remove toxins and contaminations from food and drink, making them safe to consume. This spell doesn't prevent future contamination, natural decay, or spoilage. One cubic foot of liquid is roughly 8 gallons.
name: Purify Food and Drink
